kizuna_math_c_02:
Oh, no! I’m not here for anything food-related
at all![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_03: I was just walking around the entrance hall...[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_04:
and I felt that intense gaze that I told you
about before![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_05: So I quickly ducked into the cafeteria here.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_06:
Our cafeteria has only one entrance, so I thought
I might be able to discover the identity of the\r
person watching me if they followed me in here![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_woman_01:
Huh? That’s weird...I thought I saw her come
in here.
kizuna_math_c_woman_02:
I guess I won’t be able to ask my question today,
either...
kizuna_math_c_08:
That girl...I feel like I’ve seen her several times
before.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_09:
She seems to be a student here, but I get the
feeling that her question is not about her studies.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_10:
Next time I see her, maybe I’ll go start up a
conversation myself![VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_11:
It could have been a little scary being here on my
own. I’m glad you were here with me.[VAR 0114(0025)]
kizuna_math_c_system_01: You feel trusted by Ms. Tyme!
